an10.154:4.1: “I will teach you the principle to realize and the principle not to realize. …
an10.154:4.3: And what is the principle not to realize?
an10.154:4.4: Wrong view, wrong motivation, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong samādhi, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.154:4.6: This is called the principle not to realize.
an10.154:4.7: And what is the principle to realize?
an10.154:4.8: Right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right samādhi, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.154:4.10: This is called the principle to realize.”
